title: Voitta Chat
description: Settings for the Voitta Chat extension.

defaultGreeting.title: Default Greeting
defaultGreeting.description: The default greeting message shown when opening a new chat.
defaultGreeting.default: Hello! How can I assist you today?

maxMessages.title: Maximum Messages
maxMessages.description: The maximum number of messages to keep in the chat history.

serverUrl.title: Voitta AI Server
serverUrl.description: The URL of the WebSocket server to connect to.

voittaApiKey.title: Voitta API Key
voittaApiKey.description: The API key for authentication with Voitta services. (Optional)

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for OpenAI-powered features. (Optional)

anthropicApiKey.title: Anthropic API Key
anthropicApiKey.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude-powered features. (Optional)

username.title: Username
username.description: Your display name for chat messages.

usernameFromJupyterHub.title: Username From JupyterHub
usernameFromJupyterHub.description: Whether the username is provided by JupyterHub.

proxyPort.title: Proxy Port
proxyPort.description: The port number for the proxy server.
